Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.86%) toPolybia-MPIA=k: 21%, I=M: 14%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 5.8 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 46.8 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 7.8 ug/ml), and B. subtilis (MIC 4.9 ug/ml).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 8 mM SDS or 40% TFE.
Literature Information.Author: de Souza BM, Dos Santos Cabrera MP, Neto JR, Palma MS. 2011
Literature Information.Title: Investigating the effect of different positioning of lysine residues along the peptide chain of mastoparans for their secondary structures and biological activities.
